languages.text: Enemies attacked by the Arbitrator or their familiar suffer the {g|f:3a4b8214c73240de911a805fe645e624}swift justice{/g} effect until the start of the Arbitrator's next turn. The Arbitrator's shotgun attacks deal +{uip|Damage|e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}% more damage to those enemies.

languages.text: Противники, атакованные арбитром или его фамильяром, получают эффект {g|f:3a4b8214c73240de911a805fe645e624}быстрое правосудие{/g}, действующий до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} арбитра. Атаки арбитра из дробовика наносят таким врагам на {uip|Damage|e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.

The Arbitrator's shotgun attacks deal +{uip|Damage|e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to those enemies.

traits.locale_text: Противники, атакованные арбитром или его фамильяром, получают эффект {g|f:3a4b8214c73240de911a805fe645e624}быстрое правосудие{/g}, действующий до начала следующего хода арбитра. Атаки арбитра из дробовика наносят таким врагам на {uip|Damage|e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}% больше урона.

Противники, атакованные арбитром или его фамильяром, получают эффект {g|f:3a4b8214c73240de911a805fe645e624}быстрое правосудие{/g}, действующий до начала следующего хода арбитра. Атаки арбитра из дробовика наносят таким врагам на {uip|Damage|e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}% больше урона.

languages.text: Vom Arbitrator oder seinem Vertrauten attackierte Gegner werden bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des Arbitrators mit {g|f:3a4b8214c73240de911a805fe645e624}Schnelljustiz{/g} belegt. Die Schrotflinten-Angriffe des Arbitrators fügen diesen Gegnern +{uip|Damage|e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3} % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu.
languages.original_text: Enemies attacked by the Arbitrator or their familiar suffer the {g|f:3a4b8214c73240de911a805fe645e624}swift justice{/g} effect until the start of the Arbitrator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The Arbitrator's shotgun attacks deal +{uip|Damage|e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to those enemies.

traits.locale_text: Vom Arbitrator oder seinem Vertrauten attackierte Gegner werden bis zum nächsten Zug des Arbitrators mit {g|f:3a4b8214c73240de911a805fe645e624}Schnelljustiz{/g} belegt. Die Schrotflinten-Angriffe des Arbitrators fügen diesen Gegnern +{uip|Damage|e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3} % mehr Schaden zu.

languages.text: Les ennemis attaqués par l'arbitrator ou son familier subissent l'effet {g|f:3a4b8214c73240de911a805fe645e624}Justice expéditive{/g} jusqu'au début du prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'arbitrator. Ses attaques au fusil à pompe leur infligent +{uip|Damage|e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.
languages.original_text: Enemies attacked by the Arbitrator or their familiar suffer the {g|f:3a4b8214c73240de911a805fe645e624}swift justice{/g} effect until the start of the Arbitrator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The Arbitrator's shotgun attacks deal +{uip|Damage|e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to those enemies.

traits.locale_text: Les ennemis attaqués par l'arbitrator ou son familier subissent l'effet {g|f:3a4b8214c73240de911a805fe645e624}Justice expéditive{/g} jusqu'au début du prochain tour de l'arbitrator. Ses attaques au fusil à pompe leur infligent +{uip|Damage|e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3} % de dégâts.

languages.text: 被法务官或其使仆攻击的敌人获得{g|f:3a4b8214c73240de911a805fe645e624}就地正法{/g}状态，持续至法务官的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始为止。法务官使用霰弹枪攻击受到此效果影响的敌人时，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高{uip|Damage|e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}%。
languages.original_text: Enemies attacked by the Arbitrator or their familiar suffer the {g|f:3a4b8214c73240de911a805fe645e624}swift justice{/g} effect until the start of the Arbitrator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The Arbitrator's shotgun attacks deal +{uip|Damage|e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to those enemies.

traits.locale_text: 被法务官或其使仆攻击的敌人获得{g|f:3a4b8214c73240de911a805fe645e624}就地正法{/g}状态，持续至法务官的下个回合开始为止。法务官使用霰弹枪攻击受到此效果影响的敌人时，造成的伤害提高{uip|Damage|e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}%。

languages.text: Los enemigos atacados por el Arbitrator o su familiar sufren el efecto {g|f:3a4b8214c73240de911a805fe645e624}Justicia rauda{/g} hasta el principio del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del Arbitrator. Los ataques de escopeta del Arbitrator infligen un +{uip|Damage|e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a estos enemigos.
languages.original_text: Enemies attacked by the Arbitrator or their familiar suffer the {g|f:3a4b8214c73240de911a805fe645e624}swift justice{/g} effect until the start of the Arbitrator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The Arbitrator's shotgun attacks deal +{uip|Damage|e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to those enemies.

traits.locale_text: Los enemigos atacados por el Arbitrator o su familiar sufren el efecto {g|f:3a4b8214c73240de911a805fe645e624}Justicia rauda{/g} hasta el principio del siguiente turno del Arbitrator. Los ataques de escopeta del Arbitrator infligen un +{uip|Damage|e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3} % de daño a estos enemigos.

languages.text: アービトレイターやそのファミリアーの攻撃を受けた敵は、アービトレイターの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時まで{g|f:3a4b8214c73240de911a805fe645e624}迅速な正義{/g}の効果を受ける。アービトレイターのショットガン攻撃は、これらの敵に対して+{uip|Damage|e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}%の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: Enemies attacked by the Arbitrator or their familiar suffer the {g|f:3a4b8214c73240de911a805fe645e624}swift justice{/g} effect until the start of the Arbitrator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The Arbitrator's shotgun attacks deal +{uip|Damage|e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to those enemies.

traits.locale_text: アービトレイターやそのファミリアーの攻撃を受けた敵は、アービトレイターの次のターンの開始時まで{g|f:3a4b8214c73240de911a805fe645e624}迅速な正義{/g}の効果を受ける。アービトレイターのショットガン攻撃は、これらの敵に対して+{uip|Damage|e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}%の追加ダメージを与える。

languages.text: Yargıcı'nın veya iyesinin saldırdığı düşmanlar, {g|f:3a4b8214c73240de911a805fe645e624}tez adalet{/g} etkisine maruz kalır. Bu etki, Yargıcı'nın bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcına dek sürer. Yargıcı'nın pompalı saldırıları, bu düşmanlara +%{uip|Damage|e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3} daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
languages.original_text: Enemies attacked by the Arbitrator or their familiar suffer the {g|f:3a4b8214c73240de911a805fe645e624}swift justice{/g} effect until the start of the Arbitrator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The Arbitrator's shotgun attacks deal +{uip|Damage|e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to those enemies.

traits.locale_text: Yargıcı'nın veya iyesinin saldırdığı düşmanlar, {g|f:3a4b8214c73240de911a805fe645e624}tez adalet{/g} etkisine maruz kalır. Bu etki, Yargıcı'nın bir sonraki turunun başlangıcına dek sürer. Yargıcı'nın pompalı saldırıları, bu düşmanlara +%{uip|Damage|e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3} daha fazla hasar verir.
